markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Candlaron's Echo](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1594)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 42

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 21">[Candlaron's Echo](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1594)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ghost" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=217" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=222" />
<trait label="Spirit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=149" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 56</row>

**Perception** +35; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +40, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +36, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +40, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +36, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +34

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +10

**Con** +0

**Int** +10

**Wis** +7

**Cha** +8
</row>

**Site Bound** 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 46 

**Fort** +30 

**Ref** +33 

**Will** +36 

</row>

**HP** 315
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation)

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
all damage 15 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297), or [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

**Rejuvenation** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Candlaron's echo rejuvenates so long as Dahak's manifestation lives.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
ghostly hand +39 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 8d8+8 negative

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 44, attack +39
- **Cantrips (10th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229)
- **1st**
[Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (×2)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) (×2)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289)
- **4th**
[Resilient Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=255), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (×2)
- **5th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Crushing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=57), [Hallucination](/Spells.aspx?ID=144)
- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33) (×2), [Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=199)
- **7th**
[Duplicate Foe](/Spells.aspx?ID=93), [Prismatic Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=233), [Reverse Gravity](/Spells.aspx?ID=261)
- **8th**
[Maze](/Spells.aspx?ID=187), [Power Word Stun](/Spells.aspx?ID=228)
- **9th**
[Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77), [Telepathic Demand](/Spells.aspx?ID=336)
- **10th**
[Wish](/Spells.aspx?ID=377)

**Frightful Moan** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The ghost laments its fate, forcing each living creature within 30 feet to attempt a DC 44 Will save. On a failure, a creature becomes [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (or frightened 3 on a critical failure). On a success, a creature is temporarily immune to this ghost's frightful moan for 1 minute.

**Telekinetic Assault** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The ghost cries out in pain and anguish as small objects and debris fly about in a 30-foot emanation. Creatures in this area take 12d6 bludgeoning damage , subject to a DC 44 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save.

</column>
name: Candlaron's Echo
resistance_markdown: all damage 15 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297), or [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))
resistance_raw: all damage 15 (except  force ,   ghost touch  , or  positive ; double resistance vs. non- magical )
